Spatial transforms¶

Spatial transform functions in 1D, 2D, and 3D.

Todo

Add CUDA implementation. Could be based of the existing 2D CUDA implementation.

class libraries.functions.stn_nd.STNFunction_ND_BCXYZ(ndim)[source]¶

Spatial transform function for 1D, 2D, and 3D. In BCXYZ format (this IS the format used in the current toolbox).

forward_stn(input1, input2, output, ndim, device_c, use_cuda=False)[source]¶
backward_stn(input1, input2, grad_input1, grad_input2, grad_output, ndim, device_c, use_cuda=False)[source]¶
forward(input1, input2)[source]¶

Perform the actual spatial transform

Parameters:
  • input1 – image in BCXYZ format
  • input2 – spatial transform in BdimXYZ format
Returns:

spatially transformed image in BCXYZ format
backward(grad_output)[source]¶

Computes the gradient

Parameters:grad_output – grad output from previous “layer”
Returns:gradient
class libraries.functions.stn_nd.STNFunction_ND(ndim)[source]¶

Spatial transform function for 1D, 2D, and 3D. In BXYZC format (NOT the format used in the current toolbox).

ndim = None¶

spatial dimension

forward(input1, input2)[source]¶

Perform the actual spatial transform

Parameters:
  • input1 – image in BXYZC format
  • input2 – spatial transform in BXYZdim format
Returns:

spatially transformed image in BXYZC format

class libraries.functions.stn_nd.STNFunction[source]¶

Legacy 2D implementation. Ignore.

digraph inheritance298438dab3 { rankdir=LR; size="8.0, 12.0"; "libraries.modules.stn_nd.STN" [URL="#libraries.modules.stn_nd.STN",fontname="Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans",fontsize=10,height=0.25,shape=box,style="setlinewidth(0.5)",target="_top",tooltip="Old legacy code for the standard 2D spatial transform. Ignore for now. Implements spatial transforms, but in BXYZC format."]; "torch.nn.modules.module.Module" -> "libraries.modules.stn_nd.STN_ND" [arrowsize=0.5,style="setlinewidth(0.5)"]; "libraries.modules.stn_nd.STN_ND_BCXYZ" [URL="#libraries.modules.stn_nd.STN_ND_BCXYZ",fontname="Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans",fontsize=10,height=0.25,shape=box,style="setlinewidth(0.5)",target="_top",tooltip="Spatial transform code for nD spatial transoforms. Uses the BCXYZ image format."]; "torch.nn.modules.module.Module" -> "libraries.modules.stn_nd.STN_ND_BCXYZ" [arrowsize=0.5,style="setlinewidth(0.5)"]; "torch.nn.modules.module.Module" [fontname="Vera Sans, DejaVu Sans, Liberation Sans, Arial, Helvetica, sans",fontsize=10,height=0.25,shape=box,style="setlinewidth(0.5)",tooltip="Base class for all neural network modules."]; }

This package implements spatial transformations in 1D, 2D, and 3D. This is needed for the map-based registrations for example.

Todo

Implement CUDA version. There is already a 2D CUDA version available (in the source directory here). But it needs to be extended to 1D and 3D. We also make use of a different convention for images which needs to be accounted for, as we use the BxCxXxYxZ image format and BxdimxXxYxZ for the maps.

class libraries.modules.stn_nd.STN_ND(dim)[source]¶

Legacy code for nD spatial transforms. Ignore for now. Implements spatial transforms, but in BXYZC format.

dim = None¶

spatial dimension

f = None¶

spatial transform function

forward(input1, input2)[source]¶

Simply returns the transformed input

Parameters:
  • input1 – image in BCXYZ format
  • input2 – map in BdimXYZ format
Returns:

returns the transformed image
class libraries.modules.stn_nd.STN_ND_BCXYZ(dim)[source]¶

Spatial transform code for nD spatial transoforms. Uses the BCXYZ image format.

dim = None¶

spatial dimension

f = None¶

spatial transform function

forward(input1, input2)[source]¶

Simply returns the transformed input

Parameters:
  • input1 – image in BCXYZ format
  • input2 – map in BdimXYZ format
Returns:

returns the transformed image
class libraries.modules.stn_nd.STN[source]¶

Old legacy code for the standard 2D spatial transform. Ignore for now.
